Contractor must perform and complete the Work within twelve (12) weeks.
full_summary:
**Invitation to Qualify for Infrastructure Project**
=============================================

### Tender Information

*   [**Solicitation Number**](#solicitation-numbers): WS3981434167
*   [**Reference Number**](#reference-numbers): WS3981434167-Doc3985532178
*   [**Tender Closing Date**](#tender-closing-dates): Thursday, 18 May 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT
*   [**Publication Date**](#publication-dates): 2 May 2023
*   [**Procurement Category**](#procurement-categories): CNST

### Project Overview

This tender invitation is for a two-phase procurement process where suppliers are invited to qualify for the construction of infrastructure at Corrections Canada's Osborne Correctional Centre (CCC) in Winnipeg. The project involves:

*   Remove existing asphalt paving and security fencing
*   Modify the existing concrete loading dock and canopy, provide new galvanized guardrail
*   Complete the work within 12 weeks

### Evaluation Criteria

The second-phase evaluation will be based on a financial bid on the project. Suppliers who qualify for the project will be invited to participate in Phase Two.

### Important Details

*   All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2:00 PM EDT on May 18, 2023. Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.
*   Suppliers must visit the SAP Ariba Discovery posting link above for complete project details, specifications, and drawings.
*   Suppliers are required to comply with all government regulations and requirements.

### Official Contact Information

*   Matthew Virakorn (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Email: <matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>

### Additional Information
Please refer to the official procurement documents for complete tender information. [Visit the official Ariba Discovery posting link](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16152488?extsite=MTYxNTI0ODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)   for complete details regarding this tender notice.
